Sources

Sources

These external sources are referenced by the BusDK design spec. They are provided as background and authority links and do not define BusDK’s behavior on their own.

  • The Art of Unix Programming: Basics of the Unix Philosophy
  • U.S. National Archives: guidance on sustainable file formats
  • Frictionless Data: Table Schema specification
  • Git documentation: Git Internals — Git Objects
  • Finlex: Kirjanpitolaki (KPL) 1336/1997
  • Library of Congress: PDF/A family, PDF for long-term preservation
  • Kirjanpitolautakunta (KILA): yleisohje kirjanpidon menetelmistä ja aineistoista (20.4.2021)
  • Frictionless Data: Data Package specification
